sentences.en: Can repair and moisten sunburnt skin, reducing redness and avoiding the skin peeling.
sentences.cn: 有效的修复并滋润晒后皮肤, 令红色减淡,防止晒后脱皮.

sentences.en: Dance and Proven ? al song , and sunburnt mirth!
sentences.cn: 饱含劲舞、恋歌与欢笑的热情!

sentences.en: Dance and Provencal song, and sunburnt mirth!
sentences.cn: 舞蹈、恋歌和灼热的欢乐!

sentences.en: DANIEL: Maybe, but sitting in theatres is safer than lying on the beach getting sunburnt!
sentences.cn: 丹尼尔: 或许吧, 但是坐在剧院里比躺在沙滩上被晒出斑来要安全得多哦!

sentences.en: Ground zero is The Thatch, the village pub joined, via its beer garden, to the even rowdier Billy Budds, rammed to the rafters with sunburnt revellers living the dream.
sentences.cn: Thatch酒吧，这家乡村酒馆通过自己的啤酒花园，加入到了吵闹的比利巴德的行列，晒得黝黑、活在梦中的狂欢者的喧哗声充满着整个酒吧。

sentences.en: Her sunburnt skin accentuates the fairness of her hair.
sentences.cn: 她那晒黑了的皮肤突出了她的一头金发.

sentences.en: I used to get really sunburnt from playing outside all day.
sentences.cn: 我以前曾因为整天在外面玩,而晒得很黑.

sentences.en: I want to buy something that can protect my skin from getting sunburnt.
sentences.cn: 我想买可以防止皮肤被晒伤的产品.

sentences.en: Mr Cooper looked fit and sunburnt.
sentences.cn: 库珀先生皮肤黝黑，看起来很健康。

sentences.en: My God! I'm afraid I'm sunburnt. all this sun!
sentences.cn: 天哪! 我怕是晒伤了. 都怪这阳光,太强了.

sentences.en: My skin peeled when I got sunburnt.
She woke him anxiously shaking at his sunburnt shoulders.
sentences.cn: 她焦急地摇着他被太阳晒黑的肩膀，唤醒了他。

sentences.en: The next year, Tuan was sunburnt but satisfied with his production very much.
sentences.cn: 第二年，俊被晒黑了，但是却对自己的生产非常满意。

sentences.en: The sunburnt grass breathed a harvest breath of dry sweetness and content.
sentences.cn: 草给阳光晒枯了,发出一阵叫人意满心欢的收获期的芳香气息.

sentences.en: The whole bus is quiet as this paradise passes in front of our sunburnt faces.
sentences.cn: 天堂般的美景在我们被太阳晒黑的面孔前掠过时，巴士上静极了。

sentences.en: Turn over or your back will get sunburnt.
sentences.cn: 翻过身去,不然你的后背要被阳光灼伤的.

sentences.en: You look sunburnt, he said to her. Did you have a nice holiday in Jersey?
sentences.cn: “你看起来晒黑了, ”他对她说, “你们在泽西岛玩得开心 吗 ?”

sentences.en: You really must not allow yourself to become sunburnt. It would be unbecoming.
sentences.cn: 你千万不能让皮肤晒黑, 这是不相宜的.

sentences.en: You would be sunburnt quickly on the beach.
sentences.cn: 在海滨你很快就能晒黑.

words.tran_cn: 晒伤皮肤；晒红皮肤；晒黑皮肤
晒黑的；有晒斑的；日炙的

trans.tran_cn: 晒黑的，日灼的，(sunburn的过去式和过去分词)
trans.tran_en: having skin that is attractively brown as a result of spending time in the sun

trans.tran_cn: 晒黑（sunburn的过去式和过去分词）
